item.description:
Hello,
I want to invite you to these seminars given by Mother Clare Watts, who is a very special Teacher. She wrote a book about her life and personal spiritual journey. It is called Giving Birth to God: a woman?s path to enlightenment. She was a home birth midwife for 17 years and a mother of 4 children. Currently, she lives in Colorado and travels throughout the country giving lectures and classes, about peace and having a one on one connection to your inner Self. She only comes to Boston 3 times a year so you don?t want to miss it. The fee is to cover her airfare. Please join me at this special event.

Here is the blurb...

Friday June 1, 7 pm
Mercy & Forgiveness: Essential Steps to Being Healed
Come to know the right timing and process of forgiveness. Be freed from the burden of pain, anger and resentment toward those who have harmed you. Know healing and peace in your heart, mind and soul. $25

See you there,
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Seminar: Mercy and forgiveness
